body.p: 1 – Click on “Log in to view your favorites” link.

2 – Putt your User name, password using your Eclipse credentials and enable flag “I agree the use of this service is governed by the Eclipse Foundation Terms of Use and the Eclipse Foundation Privacy Policy”
4 – Click No button when “Secure Storage – Password Hint Needed” message came on the screen
5 – Go to the Eclipse main menu, open Help and choose Eclipse Marketplace…

p.b: Figure 2-6. Log in to the Eclipse account from Marketplace

p.xref: See “Appendix A. How to create Eclipse account.”

body.p: After Eclipse account authorization, follow the steps to add searched tool to favorites:
1 – Click star icon in the left side of the searched tool
2 – Star icon will be colored by yellow
3 – Searched tool will be added to favorites

p.b: Figure 2-7. Adding apps to favorites steps
